newsitem.title: USA: Texas/w Okla feedlot cattle market not tested-USDA.
newsitem.headline: Texas/w Okla feedlot cattle market not tested-USDA.

text.p: Trade was at a standstill in the Panhandle Tuesday, USDA said. Slaughter steers and heifers were not tested. Feedlots reporting light inquiry from buyers.

There were 17,600 head confirmed for the week to date, which includes 12,500 formulated and 700 previously contracted cattle to be shipped this week. The last established price was $67.00 per cwt last Friday. Tuesday's packer bids were $66.00, with asking prices $68.00-$69.00.
Note - all cattle prices based on net weights FOB the
Confirmed - None Week Ago - 100 Year Ago - None
Wk to Date - 17,600 Week Ago - 19,700 Year Ago - 24,900
